      • org.eclipse.gef.ui.parts.GraphicalViewerImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIDefaults, de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.utils.ISearchable<IGraphicalFeature>, org.eclipse.gef.EditPartViewer, org.eclipse.gef.GraphicalViewer, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelectionProvider

    public class FeatureDiagramViewer
extends org.eclipse.gef.ui.parts.ScrollingGraphicalViewer
implements de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.utils.ISearchable<IGraphicalFeature>, GUIDefaults
    An editor based on the Graphical Editing Framework to view and edit feature diagrams and cross-tree constraints.
    Author:
    Thomas Thuem
